description:
Nessus Agents give you visibility into additional IT assets - even endpoints, and other remote assets that intermittently connect to the internet.


Bug Fixes

Bug Fix Defect ID
Updated the Windows agent MSI installer to resolve an upgrade failure between versions 11.0.3 and 11.1.0.
02407814
Fixed an issue that caused agents assigned with CPU Utilization Controls (via Tenable Vulnerability Management agent profiles) or CPU Limit % (via Tenable Nessus Manager agent profiles) to hang. 02410221 and others
Fixed an issue that prevented Windows agents from installing on Windows ARM64 in non-English environments. n/a
Upgrade Notes
- You can upgrade to the latest version of Tenable Agent from any previously supported version.
- If your upgrade path skips versions of the Tenable Agent, Tenable recommends reviewing the release notes for all skipped versions to learn about new features and bug fixes.
- If you are connecting to Tenable Vulnerability Management through Tenable Nessus scanners, Tenable Agents, Tenable Web App Scanning scanners, or Tenable Network Monitors (NNM) located in mainland China, you must connect through sensor.cloud.tenablecloud.cn instead of sensor.cloud.tenable.com.
